comment.text: This key displays the label "Integration URL" within a form field in the AI Settings section of the Portal Settings. It's used to prompt the user to enter a URL for integration purposes, and is marked as a required field. Translators should ensure the translation accurately conveys the purpose of this URL input.

usage.context:
<Text className={styles.fieldHint}>
 {t("AISettings:ProviderNameInputHint")}
 </Text>
 </FieldContainer>
 <FieldContainer
 labelText={t("AISettings:IntegrationURL")}
 isRequired
 isVertical
 removeMargin
 labelVisible
 errorMessage={urlError}
